This is a debug version that can help us to solve some crash-events when you export videos. 
 There are some information you should know as follow: 
1. Edit and export videos as normal; 
2. If it was crashed, when you open this application again, it will copy all relative files to the directory (root directory /V Recorder Log Pack). 
3. Please package the directory on computer and send it to us by email: support@enjoy-global.com
 That's all, thank you very much.

Now your V Recorder is a free version. And we have released Pro V Recorder. If you like our app, you can purchase the Pro version to support our team. And the Pro version has some different features: 

1.No ads
2.You can download exclusive materials for Pro user. 
3. Support 4K videos

1. No ads 
2. Support exporting 1080p videos 
3. Exclusive materials 
4. Support importing 4K videos 
5. No V Recorder watermark 
6. Add up to 20 effects 
7. No reverse duration limit

Video exporting will run in background. Android system will fail background task if there is not enough memory. So You\'d better not run app which is using too much memory (Such as web browser, video play), to prevent video process being killed probably.

First step: find' internal storage' in your phone. 
 Second step: delete 1V Recorder and .1V Recorder folder (if you don't see .1V Recorder folder, you should switch on to show hidden files). 
 Third step: start up V Recorder. 
 Attention: if you failed, try again or contact us at support@enjoy-global.com.

Please select the root directory of your external storage \"%1$s\" on the subsequent screen and click the select button to authorize the app write access. Starting with android 5.0 Lollipop, due to android security policy changes, files on external storage may not be deleted or renamed if application write permissions are not authorized.

Due to system limitations, the "Show Touch" function could not be opened directly through V Recorder. If you still need to show the click location during recording, you can turn it on in your device settings.The steps are as follows (Methods may vary by the brand of your device.): \n\nStep 1: Click "Developer Options" on "Settings" page or "Additional settings" page of your phone
Step 2: Find and turn on "Show taps" in "Developer Options"

If you do not have "Developer Options" on your device,you need to enable the developer mode first. The enabling steps are as follows: \n\nClick "About phone" or "My device" to enter "Software information", and then click "Version number" for about 5 times. The system will prompt "you are in developer mode now". When you return to the"Settings" page, you will see "Developer options"(Please note that "Version number" is not "Android version number". Names may vary by the brand of your device. For example, it\'s "MIUI version" on Xiaomi device, and "Build number" on Samsung device.)

string-array.name: text_full_context
string-array.item: Please wait here patiently for watching the elaborate video you made. Or it will fail to export if you exit the current page.
Ads help keep V Recorder as a free app. Thanks for your understanding. You can also download Pro Version to remove ads.
If your phone performance is poor, using large video sources or too many materials will fail to export. So please try again after deleting some materials or effects.
Use \"Ultra Cut\" to trim multiple parts from one video, and save quickly. It\'s a very useful feature to make videos slim down.
Friendly Reminder: FAST MODE is with fast exporting speed but lower video resolution, while HD MODE takes more time to export but provides higher quality.
Slow down or speed up the video by clicking \"Speed\" in \"Clip Edit\".
After the video is exported successfully, you could rename it in My Studio or share to your friends.
Click \"Multi Music\" in \"Pro Edit\" to add multiple music in one video.
It takes so much time to export? An awesome video will be shown to you if you would choose to drink a cup of coffee.
In multiple music mode, you can set different volume for different music.
Make full use of \"Sticker\". It supports Built-in Stickers, your own Images, and Gifs, and it supports multiple layers!
Exclusive: You may select music to play while video shooting, it\'s easy to shoot a dance-sync video.
You can change background colors by clicking the setting icon at the right top in Edit Studio.
Zoom the video or picture, it makes your video focus on the position you want. Click \"Pro Edit\" > \"Clip Edit\" > \"Zoom\".
Use \"Compress Video\" to make videos slim down and share faster with low bandwidth network. Click \"Compress Video\" in homepage.
Want more features? Feel free to send emails to support@enjoy-global.com and tell us.
